title: Which is a better optional subject in IAS, history or public administration? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: Please select optional purely based on your interest. Don't select optional because someone said it is easy or easy to gain high score. It is false. The subject you like most must be your choice for optional then you can score exceptionally well. Thank you.
I think public administration is best ….bcz it has a limited syllabus in comparison to history …..nd history is too much complicated nd boring
